casebody.head_matter:
PHILIP MORRIS USA INC., et al.
v.
James Harris LOURIE, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Barbara Ruth Lourie, Deceased.
No. 17-401 (R46-016/OT 2017).
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 18, 2018.
The petition for writ of certiorari was dismissed today pursuant to Rule 46.1 of the Rules of this Court.
